title: help????
body:
@riot So i clicked the new launcher
it opens a error appears saying
TRYING TO RECONNECT
We're attempting to automatically reconnect you to League ofLegends. If your internet connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for possible solutions.

Exit Instead

i cant even get to the point of wwhich i can type in my log in information like wth
@me
Hey AcE21,

First off, this is NOT a warning or punishment to your Boards account. Your discussion has been removed due to being posted in the wrong sub-section. We know you're passionate and we want to make sure that you have these conversations in the correct avenues!

Here's the link to your deleted discussion:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/PXHp87kJ-attempting-to-reconnect-wtf

A good place to post this would be in:

Help & Support

@riot i did post it in help and support.....

replies.body:
These issues usually happen if there's something wrong with one or more of your local network settings that cause an*unstable connection* to our servers. Your best bet would be to work through the steps inside our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can confirm that your network settings are configured to our recommended specifications.

Let me know if this didn't resolve your issue.

i get into the log in passed that can get to a game then have restart client and hope it doesn't pop up and it pops up right after the game i have 98down 24mb up and a 24ping i doubt its my internet..

I'm glad you're able to login, however, the servers you're accessing for login and the game are different servers. This means you could access one but have issues connecting to the other, which is why I suspect there's something up with your local settings. 

Go ahead and work through that guide in its entirety and let me know if you experience any changes.
please dude why is it i have to go through this bs constantly i have no fucking firewall new dns bs shit isn;t working

Since you're still having issues after working through our connection guide, we'll need to see your network and system logs to determine what else could be causing this. I recommend running some logs with our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before attaching them to your [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission. One of our tech specialists will be in touch as soon as possible after you've submitted your ticket.

Let me know if you encounter any troubles submitting your ticket.
